TITLE: "Chart of the Day: Central Banks Race to Purchase Gold – What Do They Know?"
AUTHOR: Tom Williams
PUBLISHER: Right Wire Report The Truth Be Told
DESCRIPTION: Did you know that nearly one-fifth of all the gold ever mined is held by central banks? As Visual Capitalist’s Govind Bhutada details, besides investors and jewelry consumers, central banks are a major source of gold demand. In fact, in 2022, central banks snapped up gold at the fastest pace since 1967. However, the record gold purchases of 2022 are in stark […]

TITLE: "Circular Economic Practices in Argentina"
AUTHOR: Otto Gunderson
DESCRIPTION: The call for circular economic practices to be used in conjunction with other aspects of the renewable energy transition has been gaining more attention within the U.S. and Europe. TITLE: "Trudeau stayed in $6,000 London hotel suite for Queen Elizabeth II’s funeral"
AUTHOR: News Staff
DESCRIPTION: The Prime Minister's Office says Justin Trudeau and his wife, Sophie Grégoire Trudeau, stayed in a $6,000 per night hotel suite while attending the funeral for Queen Elizabeth II.
